title: Internal
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
Companies
 and 
contacts
 that are part of the organization that is licensed to use 
SmartSimple
.
 Some common 
roles
 for internal users might include: 
Global User Administrator
, Employee, Executive Staff, Program Manager, etc  
 An easy way to think of the 
internal 
user is that they are working 
for
 the 
root organization
 
In the 
organization hierarchy
, internal companies and contacts are always listed under the first tab. 
Note
: 
A user can either be internal or external; they cannot be transferred nor hold both internal and external access at once.
